select a.lyb_no, b.prod_name, b.seller_id, c.domain_type, c.file_purpose, c.original_filename, c.file_id, c.file_status, c.reg_dt from user_library as a inner join product_master as b on a.prod_no = b.prod_no LEFT join file_master as c on c.domain_id = a.prod_no and c.file_purpose = "RELEASE" and c.domain_type = "PRODUCT"
where a.user_id = #{userId}
